input.sentences: i went to the park one afternoon .
afterward i hung out at the pier .
some people were playing music there .
i was getting hungry so i left to find something to eat .
i went to a restaurant to eat .
output.sentences: This park in Venice is absolutely beautiful.
The pier along the promenade beats all others I have seen.
Don't you just love seeing the old men with their games?
A trip down the canal is in order.
Let's dine in the enclosed restaurant, shall we?
